title: Investors

en: But #NAME, you haven't mentioned wanting investors. Are you sure you're ready for this big of a step? How comfortable are you with someone being this involved?

no_caption: I don't like it, but maybe I need it

en: Is it about having more accountability? Okay. I don't completely understand where you're coming from, but if you've really thought about this, I won't stop you.
You don't need anybody, not really.
Of course, you might not be able to do it in the timeframe you want... and maybe it'll blow up in your face... and it's your own money you're risking, if you go that way...
